comments: Mr. Marshall gives you an essay for every assignment, no joke. Be prepared for long essay requirements that don\'t help you succeed. He will grade essays hard and give you plenty of them despite your other classes. Don\'t take his class unless you like writing long assignments...

comments: I don\'t think he is aware that we as students have other classes on top of responsibilities outside of work. The essays give way to many unecessary requirements that are irrelevant to how a paper should be graded and gives very little time to work on each paper, not to mention he assigns one right after the other.

comments: I loved Mr. B, he was always available to meet with me in office hours to get extra help on my essays. He gives you the chance to keep revising any essay written for class until you receive the grade you want. if you put a lot of effort in, you will get a good grade. he does not grade to hard either, and it is not a big deal if you miss class

comments: Essays are assigned often, but aren\'t difficult at all. He\'s very willing to help in as well as out of class. He makes the class environment feel very close and a safe place to express yourself, esp through writing.

comments: Professor Marshall was by far one of my favorite english teachers ever. He is very straightforward, doesn\'t grade too hard and keeps the class entertaining. There is a lot of worksheets which makes the class more enjoyable rather than lectures all day long. Has quite a few papers but gives you a lot of time to work on them.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Get ready to read (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: He doesn\'t have tests and gave out one quiz. He\'s a fairly easy teacher as long as you do the homework, write your papers, and show up to class. No textbook. He sends out links for articles for you to print out. He has this grading contract where you are guaranteed a B if you meet it\'s criteria and one of them is attendance. I recommend him 100% :)

comments: Marshall is an extremely easy grader but you do a lot of unnecessary reading and he assigns homework almost every class. What I didn\'t like about this class was how scatter brained he was. Prompts for papers never made sense and lacked serious structure, although it was a fun class stressing every week was not worth it.

comments: Strong passion for english. Makes sure that the environment is comfortable, meaning you know all your other classmates in order to be consistently sharing each others\' essays during workshops. There aren\'t any strangers in this class. Doesn\'t req a textbook. Really cares about his students.

comments: Brandon is super cool and laid back. He has helped me grow as a writer faSHO and he does care about his students. You\'re definitely going to have to WORK, but chill, you got this. He and the rest of the class will be there to help you each step of the way. He also has this guaranteed B policy. Just show up on time, participate, and do your work.

comments: This class is really engaging. I didn\'t realize my potential writing skills until I was put to the test. Workload is terrifying but possible if you\'re willing to apply yourself.

comments: I sucked at English in High School but this class really helped me. He is very flexible and is always available to help. No use of textbooks but be in active reader with the readings!! They are a great help when writing accents. He sets a good class environment too so you get really comfortable with classmates and peer editing.

comments: Great teacher, if you\'re willing to learn,he\'s great. No textbook needed this semester, not sure if it will change. Not much HW, but when there is hw, do it! If you slack, you get a slacking grade. So don\'t slack. Its east stuff.

comments: Learned a lot from this guy. Has an interesting way of teaching. You will use the book a lot, so get it. Attendance is not too strict, but after many absences, you will start to lose points. I thought he was a good teacher. Not exactly a light workload, but overall, very helpful and flexible. I recommend him!!!

comments: Although you have a lot of work to do, Mr. Marshall was a great teacher. He was a fairly easy grader (i did all my essays the night before and got A\'s on all of then) but kepy in ming that the workload is king of insane, it was a lot to handle. But he is always willing to help if you need it, which was great

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Get ready to read (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: If youre looking for a teacher who doesnt give out homework, look away. Marshall gives readings and 2pg rhetorical analyses about twice a week, on top of 3 essays and a research paper. BUT, hw and classes were REALLY engaging and interesting. Take him if you want a learning experience and are willing to put in the time &effort. You won\'t regret it!

comments: He is a very cool guy! Very easy and very helpful. Took him for 104 and the class was like a high school class a little boring and he tries to make the class into a family. Loves his job so makes learning more pleasant. Cool dude!
